top.title: Trump criticises 'decaying' European countries and 'weak' leaders
top.summary: The UK praises Europe's "strength" after Trump says countries fail to control migration or take action to end the Ukraine war.

top.title: Sperm from donor with cancer-causing gene was used to conceive almost 200 children
top.summary: Some children have already died and only a minority who inherit the mutation will escape cancer in their lifetimes.

top.title: Chaos in Brazil Congress during push to cut Bolsonaro's sentence
top.summary: Scuffles broke out during a vote linked to attempts to reduce the former president's jail term.

top.title: UK spending half an hour longer online than in pandemic, says Ofcom
top.summary: The survey found people in the UK spent on average four hours and 30 minutes online every day in 2025

top.title: Google unveils plans to try again with smart glasses in 2026
top.summary: It is a significant turnaround for the tech giant after its first attempt - Google Glass - was pulled in 2015.

top.title: EU investigates Google over AI-generated summaries in search results
top.summary: It is examining whether the tech giant did not offer "appropriate compensation" to web publishers.

title.#text: The AI industry’s biggest week: Google’s rise, RL mania, and a party boat

Both sides of the aisle hate the AI moratorium
